segments.text: I like the freedom of summer with no school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , and all those fun summer sports and activities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I like the festivities of winter with Thanksgiving , Christmas and New Year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , me too ! All the family getting together ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I really like the smells and colors of spring .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the feeling then that school is almost over !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I must say , if it were only for the weather , I like autumn most !
segments.speaker: S2
